title: Raw Beets With Orange-coriander Vinaigrette
summary: Raw Beets With Orange-coriander Vinaigrette might be just the side dish you are searching for. One serving contains 126 calories, 2g of protein, and 9g of fat. This recipe serves 6 and costs 85 cents per serving. Only a few people made this recipe, and 6 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 41 minutes. A mixture of olive oil, coriander seeds, honey, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal diet. With a spoonacular score of 45%, this dish is solid. Try Beets with Orange Vinaigrette, Beets With Orange Vinaigrette Recipe, and Paprikan and Coriander Rubbed Steaks With Orange-Coriander Salsa for similar recipes.
instructions: Prepare an ice-water bath; set aside. Peel beets. Using a mandoline, thinly slice into rounds. Transfer to ice-water bath; refrigerate 30 minutes.

steps.step: Prepare an ice-water bath; set aside. Peel beets. Using a mandoline, thinly slice into rounds.
Transfer to ice-water bath; refrigerate 30 minutes.
